member.name: NMTVITEMCHANGE
member.summary: Contains information on a tree-view item change. This structure is sent with the TVN_ITEMCHANGED and TVN_ITEMCHANGING notifications.

member.name: NMTVITEMCHANGE.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about the notification.

summary.para: Specifies the attribute. The only supported attribute is state. uChanged must have the following value:

listheader.description: The change is the state attribute.

member.name: NMTVITEMCHANGE.hItem
member.summary: Handle to the changed tree-view item.

member.name: NMTVITEMCHANGE.uStateNew
member.summary: Flag that specifies the new item state.

member.name: NMTVITEMCHANGE.uStateOld

member.name: NMTVITEMCHANGE.lParam
